description: Decentlab is a Swiss company providing wireless sensor devices and services for distributed, cost-effective monitoring solutions. Its sensor devices communicate wirelessly over LoRaWANÂ® and are designed for ultra low power consumption, capable of operating on batteries for several years. The devices are built for industrial applications and are ready to be deployed in any harsh indoor or outdoor environment. Application areas are environmental and air quality monitoring, hydrological measurements, smart agriculture and smart cities.
